description: [SLIGHTPULSE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1110) has the ability to process HTTP GET requests as a normal web server and to insert logic that will read or write files or execute commands in response to HTTP POST requests.(Citation: Mandiant Pulse Secure Zero-Day April 2021)

external_references.description: Perez, D. et al. (2021, April 20). Check Your Pulse: Suspected APT Actors Leverage Authentication Bypass Techniques and Pulse Secure Zero-Day. Retrieved February 5, 2024.
